add_portrait;Gilliam;MidLeft
bop_portrait;Gilliam
speak;Gilliam;The water is calm today.|Perfect conditions for fishing.
speak;Gilliam;Franz mentioned this spot was promising.|Now let's see if those rumors about the Golden Fin are true...
speak;Gilliam;There's movement...|Easy now...
bop_portrait;Gilliam
speak;Gilliam;Argh!|Curses!
speak;Gilliam;The hook...|It's embedded in my hand.
add_portrait;Natasha;MidRight
speak;Natasha;Sir Gilliam?|I heard you cry out.|Are you injured?
speak;Gilliam;Sister Natasha.|It's nothing serious.|Just a fishing accident.
bop_portrait;Natasha
speak;Natasha;Let me see...|Oh! The hook is quite deep.
speak;Natasha;Please, allow me to help.|I have my staff with me.
speak;Gilliam;If you insist.|Though it's hardly a battle wound.
speak;Natasha;Hold still.|This may hurt a moment...
speak;Gilliam;.....;no_talk
speak;Natasha;There.|The hook is out.|Now let me heal the wound.
expression;Natasha;CloseEyes
speak;Natasha;May the sacred light close this wound...
expression;Natasha;NormalBlink
speak;Gilliam;Thank you, Sister Natasha.|Your skills are as impressive as ever.
expression;Natasha;Smile
speak;Natasha;I'm glad I was nearby.|But I must admit, I'm surprised to see|one of Frelia's finest knights fishing.
speak;Gilliam;Even knights need moments of peace.|Franz and I come here when duties allow.
speak;Gilliam;Today I'm hoping to catch the Golden Fin.|A rare fish said to appear in these waters.
speak;Natasha;The Golden Fin?|I've heard tales of it.|Isn't it said to bring fortune and wealth to its captor?
speak;Gilliam;That's what the locals say.|One glimpse of its scales brings prosperity.
speak;Natasha;Do you...need money so badly, Sir Gilliam?
speak;Gilliam;Money?|No, that's not why I'm here.
speak;Gilliam;I simply enjoy the challenge of catching rare fish.|The legends are just stories that add to the experience.
speak;Natasha;I see.|So it's the pursuit itself that interests you,|not the promised reward.
speak;Natasha;That's...admirable.|Many would be tempted by tales of wealth.
speak;Gilliam;A knight's honor isn't measured in gold, Sister Natasha.|It's found in duty, discipline, and...
bop_portrait;Gilliam
speak;Gilliam;Wait!|Something's on the line!
speak;Natasha;Oh!
speak;Gilliam;It's strong!|Must be a large one!
speak;Natasha;Be careful of your hand!
bop_portrait;Gilliam
speak;Gilliam;Almost...|Got it!
speak;Gilliam;By the Sacred Stones...|It's the Golden Fin!
bop_portrait;Natasha
speak;Natasha;It's beautiful!|Its scales truly do shimmer like gold!
speak;Gilliam;Never thought I'd actually catch one.|Look at the markings on its fins.
speak;Natasha;What will you do with it?|Surely you won't...kill such a rare creature?
speak;Gilliam;Of course not.
speak;Gilliam;A true knight respects all forms of life.|Even those beneath the waves.
speak;Gilliam;Here, would you like to touch it?|Carefully, so we don't damage its scales.
speak;Natasha;It's so smooth...|Thank you for sharing this moment.
speak;Gilliam;Now, back to where you belong, little one.
bop_portrait;Gilliam
speak;Gilliam;There.|May you live long and bring others joy.
expression;Natasha;Smile
speak;Natasha;That was a wonderful thing to do, Sir Gilliam.|I'm glad to see such compassion.
speak;Gilliam;What's that in the water?|Something's floating to the surface.
speak;Gilliam;Is that...a bag?
speak;Gilliam;|It's heavy...
expression;Natasha;NormalBlink
speak;Natasha;Sir Gilliam...that looks like...|Is that gold?!
speak;Gilliam;Indeed it is.|A considerable amount too.
speak;Gilliam;The legend was true after all.|Though not quite in the way I expected.
speak;Natasha;This is incredible!|What will you do with it?
speak;Gilliam;This gold doesn't belong to me alone.|It would best serve our cause.
speak;Natasha;You mean...?
speak;Gilliam;War funds.|For supplies, weapons, and healing items.
expression;Natasha;Smile
speak;Natasha;You continue to impress me, Sir Gilliam.|Your honor truly isn't measured in gold.
speak;Gilliam;It's the right thing to do.|Besides, I already received my reward today.
speak;Natasha;Oh?|What reward was that?
expression;Gilliam;Smile
speak;Gilliam;A rare fish, good company,|and a reminder that some legends have truth to them.
expression;Natasha;Smile
speak;Natasha;Indeed.|Shall we bring this to Prince Ephraim?
speak;Gilliam;After you, Sister Natasha.|Perhaps there's something to be said for fishing after all.
